gapped.prompt: Make gapped alignment of ungapped-MSP contigs (-G)

format.python: ( ""  , " -l "+str(value) )[ value is not None  and value !=vdef]

old_cutoff.prompt: Use old step cutoffs for adjacency instead of the new continuous system. (-O)

threshold_id.prompt: Reject all matches with less than this % identity (-I)

threshold_length.prompt: Reject all matches with length less than this value (-L)

expect.prompt: Reject all matches with E-value higher than this value (-e)

query.prompt: Read in query seq (for rereading .seqbl files) (-Q)

whole_contig.prompt: Coverage limitation requires whole contig to be covered (always for Blastp) (-a)

no_hits_to_earlier.prompt: Ignore hits to earlier seqnames (for All-vs-All) (-A)

stats_without_X.prompt: Recalculate percentage identity, ignoring X residues. (-j)

stats_without_end.prompt: Recalculate percentage identity, ignoring mismatches at ends. (-J)

silent_mutations.prompt: Do Statistics of Silent mutations (only cDNA!) (-S)

all_expected.prompt: Print all Expected scores (default only when positive) (-X)

matches_one_line.prompt: For Big Picture output, force all matches to the same subject on one line (-F)

wublast_numbered.prompt: Indicate query insertions with numbers (For seqbl output from Wublast) (-N)

dont_mirror.prompt: Don't mirror (i.e. print the subject object) in ACE4 format (-M)

exbldb.prompt: Produce exbldb output (as exblx with query names) (-d)

footer.prompt: Print footer with parameters and stats (-f)

comment: <{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}div > <{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}p >MSAProbs is an open-source protein multiple sequence ailgnment algorithm, achieving the stastistically highest alignment accuracy on popular benchmarks: <{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a href="http://www-bio3d-igbmc.u-strasbg.fr/balibase/">BALIBASE</{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a>, <{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a href="http://www.drive5.com/muscle/prefab.htm">PREFAB</{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a>, <{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a href="http://bioinformatics.vub.ac.be/databases/databases.html">SABMARK</{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a>, <{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a href="http://www.compbio.dundee.ac.uk/Software/Oxbench/oxbench.html">OXBENCH</{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a>, compared to ClustalW, MAFFT, MUSCLE, ProbCons and Probalign.</{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}p> </{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}div> </comment>
